property.name: border
property.description: Outer window border.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for sells.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for sells.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for sells.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for sells.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding around the shell's client area.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for shells.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the shell. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: box-shadow
property.description: The shadow behind the shell.

property.name: animation
property.description: Animation that is triggered on emergence and disappearance of a Shell. Supported animation types are "flyInTop", "flyInBottom", "flyInRight", "flyInLeft", "flyOutTop", "flyOutBottom", "flyOutRight" and "flyOutLeft".

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the shell should have a border.

style.name: APPLICATION_MODAL
style.description: Indicates that the shell is modal.

style.name: TOOL
style.description: Indicates that the shell should behave like a tool window.

style.name: SHEET
style.description: Indicates that the shell should behave like a sheet window.

style.name: TITLE
style.description: Indicates that the shell should show it's title bar.

state.name: inactive
state.description: Applies for all shells except the active shell.

state.name: maximized
state.description: Applies for shells that are currently maximized.

element.name: Shell-Titlebar
element.description: The window titlebar. Only visible when the TITLE style is set.

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for the title bar.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for the title bar. Maps to system colors SWT.COLOR_TITLE_BACKGROUND and SWT.COLOR_TITLE_INACTIVE_BACKGROUND, respectively.

property.name: background-gradient-color
property.description: Second background color for the title bar (currently ignored). Maps to system colors SWT.COLOR_TITLE_BACKGROUND_GRADIENT and SWT.COLOR_TITLE_INACTIVE_BACKGROUND_GRADIENT, respectively.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the title bar.

property.name: font
property.description: Font for the title bar.

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for the title bar.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for the title bar.

property.name: height
property.description: Height of the title bar.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Shadow for title bar text.

state.name: inactive
state.description: Applies for all shells except the active shell.

property.name: border
property.description: Shell titlebar border.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for shell titlebar.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for shell titlebar.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for shell titlebar.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for shell titlebar.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

element.name: Shell-MinButton
element.description: The minimize button of a window. Only visible when the MIN style flag is set.

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for the minimize button.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Image for the minimize button.

state.name: maximized
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on maximized shells.

state.name: inactive
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on inactive shells.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on mouse-over.

element.name: Shell-MaxButton
element.description: The maximize/restore button of a window. Only visible when MAX style flag is set.

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for the shell maximize/restore button.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the shell maximize/restore button.

state.name: maximized
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on maximized shells.

state.name: inactive
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on inactive shells.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on mouse-over.

element.name: Shell-CloseButton
element.description: The close button of a window. Only visible when CLOSE style flag is set.

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for the shell close button.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the shell close button.

state.name: maximized
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on maximized shells.

state.name: inactive
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on inactive shells.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies for shell buttons on mouse-over.

element.name: Shell-DisplayOverlay
element.description: An overlay that stays between (regarding the z-order) the display area and a modal shell when it is open.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for the overlay.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the overlay.

property.name: animation
property.description: Supports animations-types "fadeIn" and "fadeOut". Others are ignored.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the overlay. A value between 0 and 1.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the modal shell has the BORDER style.

style.name: TOOL
style.description: Indicates that the modal shell has the TOOL style.

style.name: SHEET
style.description: Indicates that the modal shell has the SHEET style.

style.name: TITLE
style.description: Indicates that the modal shell has the TITLE style.
